trans-unit.source: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized" /> method returns <see langword="false" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Se utiliza para crear un objeto de marcador de posición siempre que el método <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> del control <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized" /> devuelve <see langword="false" /> para un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: El conjunto de controles de elementos Web proporciona un mecanismo de autorización para determinar si individuales <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> pueden agregarse controles a una página.

trans-unit.source: Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores, opcionalmente, pueden asignar una cadena arbitraria a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> propiedad en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control consiste en Agregar controles a una página, comprueba este valor de filtro con los criterios establecidos por el programador, mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> método y devuelve `false` si un control no está autorizado.

trans-unit.source: This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones, because these controls are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, and this object inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este mecanismo también funciona con controles de servidor y controles de usuario que se colocan en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zonas, dado que estos controles se ajustan con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto en tiempo de ejecución y este objeto hereda la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not authorized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control inserts an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control no está autorizado, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar inserciones un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control en el árbol de control de la página en lugar del control no autorizado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control from being lost.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control en el árbol de control de recursos en reserva en la posición del control no autorizado en la página y evita que los datos de personalización que un usuario puede haber aplicado previamente para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control se pierdan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control nunca se muestra en una página en la que se inserta ni aparecen en el código fuente de la página representada.

trans-unit.source: Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores pueden comprobar su presencia en el árbol de control de la página mediante la comprobación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29> method to create custom authorization criteria.
trans-unit.target: La primera parte del ejemplo de código es un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control que reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29> método para crear criterios de autorización personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property set to a specific value, or any control that has no value assigned to the property, will be authorized, and controls not meeting these criteria will not be authorized.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control que tiene su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> se autorizará la propiedad establecida en un valor específico, o cualquier control que no tiene ningún valor asignado a la propiedad, y no se autorizará controles que no cumplan estos criterios.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: La segunda parte del ejemplo de código es la página Web que hospeda la personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

trans-unit.source: There are three static server controls declared within the `<asp:webpartzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: Hay tres controles de servidor estáticos declarados dentro de la `<asp:webpartzone>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Although these controls are not actually <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, they will be wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, so you can treat them as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and thus assign values to their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Aunque estos controles no son realmente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles, se ajustará con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto en tiempo de ejecución, por lo que se puede tratar como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controla y, por tanto, asignar valores a sus <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control has its filter set to the value that should enable it to be authorized, according to the criteria in the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control tiene su filtro establecido en el valor que debe habilitarlo para que se autorice, según los criterios de personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control has a filter value that should cause it not to be authorized.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control tiene un valor de filtro que pueda provocar que no se pueden autorizar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control does not assign a value to the property, so by default it should be authorized.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control no asigna un valor a la propiedad, por lo que de forma predeterminada, debería estar autorizado.

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files.
trans-unit.target: La tercera parte del ejemplo de código es una configuración que se debe agregar en el archivo Web.config para habilitar la exportación de archivos de descripción de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que tiene un archivo Web.config en el mismo directorio que la página Web para este ejemplo de código.

trans-unit.source: Within the `<system.web>` section, make sure there is a `<webParts>` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup.
trans-unit.target: En el `<system.web>` sección, asegúrese de que hay un `<webParts>` elemento con un `enableExport` atributo establecido en `true`, como en el siguiente código de marcado.

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> controls are rendered as expected, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is not rendered because it was not authorized.
trans-unit.target: Cargar la página en un explorador y observe que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> controles se representan como se esperaba, pero la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control no se representa, porque no se ha autorizado.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **List WebPart Controls** button causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to list the IDs of all controls in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Al hacer clic en el **controles de elemento Web de lista** botón causas el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control para mostrar los identificadores de todos los controles en su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> colección.

trans-unit.source: Note that the ID for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is listed, proving that an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control was added to the page control tree to hold its place, even though the label is not rendered in the page.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que el identificador de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> se muestra el control, lo que demuestra que un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control se agregó en el árbol de control de página para mantener su posición, incluso si la etiqueta no se representa en la página.

trans-unit.source: Initializes property data for a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa los datos de propiedad de una nueva instancia de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor, in both of its overloads, calls base constructors in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor, en sus dos sobrecargas, llama a constructores base en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> clase.

trans-unit.source: These constructors each initialize property data and create a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Estos constructores cada inicializar los datos de propiedad y crear una nueva instancia de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls (and other server or user controls) to its collection of controls, it checks each control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control consiste en agregar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles (y otros controles de servidor o usuario) a la colección de controles, comprueba cada control mediante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If a control instance is not authorized, certain property values from the control (such as its ID) are assigned to properties in a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control is then added to the control tree of the page in place of the control that failed authorization.
trans-unit.target: Si una instancia del control no está autorizada, ciertos valores de propiedad del control (por ejemplo, su identificador) se asignan a las propiedades en una nueva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> (control) y el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, a continuación, se agrega al árbol de control de la página en lugar del control que no se pudo autorización.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control is never rendered in a page, and a user has no way of knowing it is there.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control nunca se procesa en una página y un usuario no tiene ninguna manera de saber que está allí.

trans-unit.source: However, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control also acts as a placeholder, maintaining the position of the original control in the control tree, and maintaining any preexisting personalization data for the original control.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control también actúa como un marcador de posición, manteniendo la posición del control original en el árbol de control y el mantenimiento de los datos de personalización preexistentes en el control de origen.

trans-unit.source: That way, if a user previously personalized a control, it then becomes unauthorized for some reason, and later it is authorized again, the user's personalization data can be restored.
trans-unit.target: De este modo, si un usuario personaliza previamente un control, a continuación, se convierte en no autorizado por alguna razón y, más adelante está autorizado de nuevo, se pueden restaurar los datos de personalización del usuario.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has failed to be authorized by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> cuya autorización no ha podido efectuar el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" /> control, called when a static <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" />, al que se llama cuando se producen errores en la autorización de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> estático (o un control de servidor o usuario).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor toma un control estático `webPart` como un parámetro, donde `webPart` error una comprobación de autorización.

trans-unit.source: A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Un control estático es aquel que se declara en el marcado de una página Web, en lugar de que se agrega mediante programación.

trans-unit.source: The constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: El constructor devuelve una nueva instancia de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, que se agrega al árbol de control de la página en lugar de `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> to participate in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el identificador del control de servidor o usuario original que se ha agregado a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> para participar en una aplicación de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the original control's type.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el nombre del tipo de control original.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene la ruta de acceso virtual relativa al control de usuario, si el control original es un control de usuario.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control that wraps the original server or user control.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el identificador del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> que contiene el control de servidor o usuario original.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" /> control, called when a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart" />, al que se llama cuando se producen errores en la autorización de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dinámico (o un control de servidor o usuario).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor is called when a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control fails its authorization check.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor se llama cuando un dinámico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> o de otro control de servidor se produce un error al comprobar la autorización.

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Un control dinámico es aquel que se agrega a una página mediante programación o mediante un usuario de un catálogo de elementos Web controla.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor devuelve una nueva instancia de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control para reemplazar el control dinámico que no pudieron autorizarse.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
